amendment.description: To improve the definitions of cybersecurity threat and cyber threat indicator.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2612 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 60. Record Vote Number: 288.

action.text: Amendment SA 2612 proposed by Senator Feinstein for Senator Franken to Amendment SA 2716. (consideration: CR S7334-7335; text as modified: CR S7334-7335) To improve the definitions of cybersecurity threat and cyber threat indicator.
